module pdbatom

module containing class PdbAtom

class pdbatom.PdbAtom

Lightweight class for reading ATOM lines of pdb files

Parameters:

  • atomSerialNumber – pdb atomSerialNumber

  • atomName (str) – pdb atomName

  • alternateLocationIndicator (str) – pdb alternateLocationIndicator

  • residueName (str) – pdb residueName

  • chainIdentifier (int) – pdb chainIdentifier

  • residueSequenceNumber – pdb residueSequenceNumber

  • insertionCode (str) – pdb insertionCode

  • xOrthogonalCoordinate (float) – pdb xOrthogonalCoordinate

  • yOrthogonalCoordinate (float) – pdb yOrthogonalCoordinate

  • zOrthogonalCoordinate (float) – pdb zOrthogonalCoordinate

  • occupancy (float) – pdb occupancy

  • temperatureFactor (float) – pdb temperatureFactor

  • temperatureFactor – pdb temperatureFactor

  • elementSymbol (str) – pdb elementSymbol

  • charge (str) – pdb charge

Example:

# read all atom lines from pdb file
atoms = []
with open('mystruct.pdb') as f:
        pdb_lines = f.readlines()
for pdb_line in pdb_lines:
        if pdb_line.startswith('ATOM'):
                atom = pdbatom.PdbAtom()
                atom.parse(pdb_line)
                atoms.append(atom)

PdbAtom.parse(line)

Parse PdbAtom values from pdb ATOM line
